Class UserInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • UserInterface

  • public class UserInterface
extends java.lang.Object

    UserInterface

    Purpose

    The UserInterface class provides all methods to prompt for and process user input.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UserInterface()
      Initializes an instance of the "Voting System" user interface.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void displayExceptionMessage(java.lang.Exception ex, java.io.OutputStream out)
      Displays an exception message to the system users when any exception is encountered throughout the lifecycle of the program.
      void displayInvalidElectionType(java.lang.String unexpected_election_type, java.io.OutputStream out)
      Displays information to the system users when the election type encountered is unexpected by the system.
      void displayResults(Election e, java.io.OutputStream out)
      Displays the results of an election to the system users.
      java.lang.String requestBallotFilename(java.io.OutputStream out, java.io.InputStream in)
      Prompts the system user for the filename of the specific ballot file they wish to process.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • UserInterface

        public UserInterface()
        Initializes an instance of the "Voting System" user interface.

    • Method Detail

      • requestBallotFilename

        public java.lang.String requestBallotFilename(java.io.OutputStream out,
                                              java.io.InputStream in)
        Prompts the system user for the filename of the specific ballot file they wish to process.
        Parameters:
        out - An OutputStream through which the request is made.
        in - An InputStream through which the user provides the request response.
        Returns:
        A String denoting the filename of the ballot file that is to be processed.

      • displayInvalidElectionType

        public void displayInvalidElectionType(java.lang.String unexpected_election_type,
                                       java.io.OutputStream out)
        Displays information to the system users when the election type encountered is unexpected by the system.
        Parameters:
        unexpected_election_type - A String denoting the unexpected election type encountered.
        out - An OutputStream where the information is written to.

      • displayExceptionMessage

        public void displayExceptionMessage(java.lang.Exception ex,
                                    java.io.OutputStream out)
        Displays an exception message to the system users when any exception is encountered throughout the lifecycle of the program.
        Parameters:
        ex - An Exception whose message is to be displayed.
        out - An OutputStream where the exception message is written to.

      • displayResults

        public void displayResults(Election e,
                           java.io.OutputStream out)
        Displays the results of an election to the system users.
        Parameters:
        e - The Election whose results are to be displayed.
        out - An OutputStream where the election results are written to.
